text:
Don't look at the camera...
Don't be conscious of it... That's it!

Nice, if you can walk like this during
the actual shoot, just a normal stroll!

...Even though Mano was just walking,
she might have noticed various things, right?

Listening to the birds, finding flowers at her feet,
bowing to people watering plants...

Just as the producer says! In this walking show,
we want to capture Mano-chan just like that.

Expressing her feelings as she feels them,
that's what we want.
